Products

Products
--------

*   [Redis Cloud Fully managed and integrated with Google Cloud, Azure, and AWS.](https://redis.io/cloud/)
*   [Redis Software Self-managed software with enterprise-grade compliance and reliability.](https://redis.io/software/)
*   [Redis Open Source In-memory database for caching & streaming.](https://redis.io/open-source/)

Tools
-----

Welcome to Redis Docs
=====================

Get Started
-----------

### Quickly set up a Redis cache, primary, vector, or custom database

Set up a Free Redis-managed database on AWS, GCP, or Azure

[Redis Cloud quick start](https://redis.io/docs/operate/rc/rc-quickstart/)

[Get started with Redis Open Source→](https://redis.io/docs/get-started/)

### Build GenAI apps

Get started using Redis for retrieval augmented generation (RAG)

[Redis with RAG](https://redis.io/docs/develop/get-started/rag/)

[Redis for AI docs and code examples→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/ai/)

### Connect with Redis client API libraries

Connect your application to a Redis database and try an example

[Redis client API library guides](https://redis.io/docs/develop/clients/)

[Python→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/clients/redis-py/)[C#/.NET→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/clients/dotnet/)[JavaScript→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/clients/nodejs/)[Java→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/clients/jedis/)[Go→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/clients/go/)[PHP→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/clients/php/)

### Client tools to connect to a Redis server

You can use the CLI, Redis Insight, or the Redis VSCode extension to connect to Redis

[Client tools overview guide](https://redis.io/docs/develop/tools/)

[Redis CLI→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/tools/cli/)[Redis Insight→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/tools/insight/)[Redis for VSCode→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/tools/redis-for-vscode/)

### Understand Redis data structures and use cases

Learn which Redis data structures to use for caching, queues, leaderboards, and more

[Redis data types guide](https://redis.io/docs/develop/data-types/)

[Common Redis use cases→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/get-started/data-store/)[Redis as a vector database→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/get-started/vector-database/)

### Resources for AI agents

Learn more about Redis documentation features that support AI agents

[Main `llms.txt` index for doc structure](https://redis.io/llms.txt)

[AI Agent Resources→](https://redis.io/docs/ai-agent-resources)[Example doc page in Markdown format→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/index.html.md)

Deploy & Operate
----------------

### Control your Redis Software on-premises and on cloud platforms

Robust support for hybrid and multi-AZ environments

[Redis deployment planning](https://redis.io/docs/operate/rs/installing-upgrading/install/plan-deployment/)

[Active-Active geo-distributed Redis→](https://redis.io/docs/operate/rs/databases/active-active/)

### Deploy on Kubernetes

Get started with the Redis Software for Kubernetes container image

[Kubernetes deployment guide](https://redis.io/docs/operate/kubernetes/deployment/quick-start/)

[Deploy Redis Software for Kubernetes with OpenShift→](https://redis.io/docs/operate/kubernetes/deployment/openshift/)

### Optimize Redis for high-scale apps

Get the Redis Insight GUI on AWS EC2, Docker, Kubernetes, and desktop

[Redis Insight install guide](https://redis.io/docs/operate/redisinsight/install/)

[Performance and memory optimization user guide→](https://redis.io/docs/develop/tools/insight/#database-analysis)

### Migrate data to or from Redis

Migrate data from files, data generators, relational databases, or snapshots

[Redis input and output CLI tool](https://redis.io/docs/integrate/riot/)

[Redis Input/Output Tool quick start→](https://redis.io/docs/integrate/riot/quick-start/)

### Ingest and sync data to Redis

Sync Redis Software with live data from your disk-based databases

[Pipeline quick start](https://redis.io/docs/integrate/redis-data-integration/quick-start-guide/)

[Redis Data Integration feature overview→](https://redis.io/docs/integrate/redis-data-integration/)

### Monitor Redis with Prometheus

Get started with the Redis Software integration for Prometheus and Grafana

[Prometheus and Grafana with Redis](https://redis.io/docs/integrate/prometheus-with-redis-enterprise/)

[Prometheus and Grafana with Redis Cloud→](https://redis.io/docs/integrate/prometheus-with-redis-cloud/)

### Use Cases

[Vector database](https://redis.io/solutions/vector-database/)[Feature stores](https://redis.io/solutions/feature-stores/)[Semantic cache](https://redis.io/redis-for-ai/)[Caching](https://redis.io/solutions/caching/)[NoSQL database](https://redis.io/nosql/what-is-nosql/)[Leaderboards](https://redis.io/solutions/leaderboards/)[Data deduplication](https://redis.io/solutions/deduplication/)[Messaging](https://redis.io/solutions/messaging/)[Authentication token storage](https://redis.io/solutions/authentication-token-storage/)[Fast-data ingest](https://redis.io/solutions/fast-data-ingest/)[Query caching](https://redis.io/solutions/query-caching-with-redis-enterprise/)[All solutions](https://redis.io/solutions)
